system.description:
Observes a creature at any distance through magical sight. You can see and hear the target and their surroundings. The target can make a save to resist.

Scaling: At dice count 3, target has disadvantage on save. At dice count 6, can scry multiple targets. At dice count 9, can scry across planes. At dice count 12, scrying is undetectable. At dice count 15, can communicate through the scrying sensor.
